A torpedo boat is a relatively small and fast naval ship designed to carry torpedoes into battle. They were created to counter battleships and other slow and heavily armed ships by using speed, agility, and the power of their torpedo weapons.

A submarine is a watercraft capable of independent operation underwater. Their primary role was anti-surface ship warfare which they accomplished either on the surface, using deck guns or submerged, using torpedoes.

On 28 June 1914, Gavrilo Princip, a Serbian nationalist, assassinated the Austro-Hungarian heir Archduke Franz Ferdinand in Sarajevo. In response, on 23 July, Austria-Hungary issued an ultimatum to Serbia. Serbia's reply failed to satisfy the Austrians, and the two moved to a war footing. Russia and France quickly mobilized to support Serbia while Germany mobilized in support of Austria-Hungary. On 3 August, Germany invaded Belgium in accordance with the Schlieffen plan of knocking out France in a quick surprise attack. The invasion of Belgium brought the United Kingdom into the war on the side of France and Russia, who had formed the Allied Powers. The Ottomans soon joined on the side of Germany and Austria and together they formed the Central Powers. Europe finds itself engulfed in the greatest war the world has ever seen, can you lead your side to victory in the war to end all wars?

The world in 1914 is a powderkeg waiting to explode. France wishes to avenge their defeat in the Franco-Prussian war and retake Alsace-Lorraine from Germany. The Tsardom's grip on Russia has weakened due to recent revolts and a humiliating loss to Japan in the Russo-Japanese war. Japan continues its imperial ambitions in Asia. Austria-Hungary is facing a wave of nationalism in the Balkans. Italy wants to assert its place among the great powers at the expense of Austria-Hungary. The Ottoman Empire is reeling from its losses in the Balkan Wars. The United Kingdom's colonial empire is still unmatched, but is being threatened by rising powers. Germany is the undisputed land power in Europe and has built a powerful fleet with the aim of challenging the UK's hegemony over the rest of the world. The United States has overtaken Britain and Germany as the world's biggest economy, but it remains to be seen if they can leverage their industrial might into military might. Who will rise and who will fall in these chaotic times?
Counter-battery fire is a battlefield military activity to defeat the enemy's indirect fire elements, including their target acquisition, command and control components.

A creeping barrage was a barrage that lifted in small increments, usually 100 yards every few minutes, so that it moved forward slowly, keeping pace with the infantry. Eventually, three patterns of advancing the barrage developed. In a creeping barrage, fire moved from one line to the next. In a block barrage, the 'block' moved as block to the next lines that were not previously engaged. In a rolling barrage, the fire on the line nearest to own troops moved to the first unengaged line furthest from own troops.

The role of medium tanks started with a prioritisation of speed. Medium tanks could travel faster, but needed help to cross trenches, where heavy tanks were large enough to cross unaided. In this later use, medium tanks represent the designer's intent of producing a successful balance of firepower, mobility, and protection. Medium tanks aim to be suitable to the widest variety of roles, with less reliance on other types of tank during normal operations.

An aircraft carrier is a warship that serves as a seagoing airbase, equipped with a full-length flight deck and facilities for carrying, arming, deploying, and recovering aircraft. Carriers allows a naval force to hit targets from far beyond the range of traditional guns.

Naval aviation is typically projected to a position nearer the target by way of an aircraft carrier. Carrier-based aircraft must be sturdy enough to withstand demanding carrier operations. They must be able to launch in a short distance and be sturdy and flexible enough to come to a sudden stop on a pitching flight deck
column3: they typically have robust folding mechanisms that allow higher numbers of them to be stored in below-decks hangars and small spaces on flight decks.

column2: Modern naval exercises evolved into detailed wargame simulations encompassing command post exercises, field exercises, and joint exercises between two or more countries.

This plant creates modern medicines by synthesizing new chemical compounds from opium.

Smokeless powder is the name given to a number of propellants used in firearms and artillery that produce negligible smoke when fired. It has several advantages over traditional gunpowder such as increased muzzle velocity, decreased barrel corrosion, and less smoke produced when fired. These advantages combined with the cheaper costs of manufacturing smokeless powder led to it replacing black powder in military and industrial use.

Synthetic rubber, like other polymers, is made from various petroleum-based monomers. A mixture of coal and oil is added together and then refined to produce the flammable hydrocarbon naphtha, which is then combined with natural gas to produce monomers. Chemical additives bond together with the monomers to form chains of polymers and the resulting product then undergoes vulcanisation in order to produce synthetic rubber.

The Haber–Bosch process, is an artificial nitrogen fixation process and is the main industrial procedure for the production of ammonia today. The process converts atmospheric nitrogen (N2) to ammonia (NH3) by a reaction with hydrogen (H2) using a metal catalyst under high temperatures and pressures.

The Haber–Bosch process, is an artificial nitrogen fixation process and is the main industrial procedure for the production of ammonia today. The process converts atmospheric nitrogen (N2) to ammonia (NH3) by a reaction with hydrogen (H2) using a metal catalyst under high temperatures and pressures.

Portland cement is the most common type of cement in general use around the world as a basic ingredient of concrete, mortar, stucco, and non-specialty grout. It was developed from other types of hydraulic lime in England in the early 19th century by Joseph Aspdin, and usually originates from limestone.

A rotary kiln is a pyroprocessing device used to raise materials to a high temperature (calcination) in a continuous process. The earliest successful rotary kilns were developed in Pennsylvania around 1890, and were about 1.5 m in diameter and 15 m in length. Such a kiln made about 20 tonnes of cement per day.

A French term used for a policy of mass national conscription, often in the face of invasion. The concept originated during the French Revolutionary Wars where it formed an integral part of the creation of national identity, making it distinct from forms of conscription which had existed before this date.
By pre-planning mobilization, all reserve units had set mobilization areas and time tables for getting equipment, boarding trains, and frontal marching routes. This sped up the mobilization vastly.

These tables categorized tasks, position, etc. so that it was easy in peace time to place personnel into combat formations. During mobilization the process was sped up as it was easy to know which soldier was to go to what company.
The introduction of working staffs at lower echelon units was a spin off from having an effective and functional General Staff. Soon all units had staffs that supported their leaders.
At this point specialists formed certain groups that serviced specialized railroad units. These could quickly load and reload trains and service the full movement of army units.
You can now build Province Selector buildings.

Lets you pass any reform without the support of the upper house and gives the reform passed modifier for several years. You must still meet other requirements listed in the reform, e.g. you must have medicine in order to enact trinket healthcare and it cannot be less than 6 months since you passed another reform. The passed modifier gives negative tax efficiency and increased militancy.
Raises your healthcare reform by one level and gives the reform passed modifier for several years. This modifier gives negative tax efficiency and increased militancy.

Raises your draft law by one level and gives the reactionary surge modifier for several years. This modifier gives negative tax efficiency, increased militancy, and pushes your POPs to become more reactionary. If your government type is a fascist or communist dictatorship, or you are currently involved in a great war, the draft law will skip to service by requirement.

Choose one of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Opium, Dye, Silk, Coffee Beans, Tea Leaves, or Tobacco. Gives a 50% output and 50% throughput debuff for 15 years.
Choose one of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Opium, Dye, Silk, Coffee Beans, Tea Leaves, or Tobacco. Gives a 50% output and 50% throughput debuff for 15 years.
Choose one of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, Opium, Dye, Silk, Coffee Beans, Tea Leaves, or Tobacco. Gives a 50% output and 50% throughput debuff for 15 years.
Changes the selected province's trade good to precious metal to represent the new financial hub of your country. Can only use this decision once and it must be on core territory.
Destroys all currently built province selectors.
Choose to change a province to the following RGO types.
Change province to produce Tea Leaves.
Change province to produce Coffee Beans.

The fields in $PROVINCENAME$ have been found favourable to the cultivation of coffee beans. With the rising world demand for coffee, local farmers have found it prudent to switch production over to the new cash crop.

The fields in $PROVINCENAME$ have been found favourable to the cultivation of opium. With the rising world demand for pharmaceuticals, local farmers have found it prudent to switch production over to the new cash crop.
You may pick from one of the following national idea groups.
Pick the political path your country will follow.
We are able to force through another reform without the support of the upper house.
Should we declare or rescind martial law?
You may no longer pass reforms without the support of the upper house.
The effects of the recruitment drive have worn off and people are returning to civilian life.
We are no longer encouraging internal migration to a targeted state.

Welcome to the tutorial of Victoria Universalis. This mod introduces several new features and game mechanics that give the player more control over their provinces and POPs. Balance and interesting gameplay are prioritized over everything else. Decisions with clear instructions on how to trigger them have replaced most random events. A few big things are included from other mods, namely reforms and country files from HPM, country size modifiers and RGO change decisions from PUIR, and art assets from PDM. If you want to end the tutorial, select the first option, if you wish to know more pick the second.
I would like to know more.

There are several decisions denoted by their green titles in the decisions tab that give bonuses to specific provinces or states. In order to use these decisions, you must first build a Province Selector (PS) building in the desired location. After enacting each decision, the PS used in the decision will be destroyed. Do not build more than one PS at a time, as the decisions will distribute their effects to a random owned province that both fulfills the conditions and has a PS, so having two or more built at the same time could result in your decision not firing in the province you wanted.
I would like to know more.

Max mine sizes have been lowered to between 5,000 to 30,000 depending on the type and location of the of mine. Labourers no longer promote into craftsmen unless their RGO is full and the excess starting labourers in mining provinces have been converted to artisans. Rubber, timber, and tropical wood RGOs now employ farmers instead of miners. A province selector decision was added to expand mining size that can be used once per province. This was done to more accurately model historical mining employment and allow provinces to have high output even with low populations.
I would like to know more.

Every 5 points of revanchism now increases both your mobilization pool and maximum solder cap in cored states by 0.5%, capped up to 5% each. Your country gains revanchism by losing core territory, and it is calculated by number of provinces lost not by population lost. You can view your current revanchism by looking in the political tab next to your government type.
I would like to know more.

POP promotion factors and national focus bonuses has been split up into 3 tiers. Large states between 2M and 4M population have roughly 2/3rd the promotion rate as normal states, and massive states over 4M population have roughly 1/3rd the promotion rate as normal states. Most states won't reach 2M population before 1900 outside of China and India, so the split mainly serves to limit the growth of a civilized China.
I would like to know more.

A number of small changes have been made in an effort to balance the in-game economy and lessen the frequency of economic crashes. New factory goods have been introduced and POP needs have been rebalanced to make normally useless goods more important. Governments will be forced to pay money to POPs through social spending in order to get pop growth. A world bank has been implemented that prevents the prices of RGO goods from crashing by buying some of the unsold resources in the world market. The world bank will always be in last place in the rankings which puts it last on the buy order.
I would like to know more.

Lategame artillery only has roughly only 2.5x as much defense as attack, as opposed to four to one in vanilla. Guards and tanks have been buffed to be better than infantry in every aspect, but their costs have increased substantially to compensate. Commerce raiders and monitors were replaced by torpedo boats and submarines and a new aircraft carrier unit was introduced. Torpedo attack is a special type of attack that only affects capital ships and deals no damage to light ships. Torpedoes were taken away from all ships except submarines and torpedo boats.
I would like to know more.

Negative general traits have been removed and the cost of recruiting generals has been increased from 20 to 40. A general's attack and defence stats are now clearly displayed in the general selection boxes and they are color coded with the following values: +1 is black, +2 is §Bblue§b, +3 is §Ggreen§b, +4 is §Rred§b, and +5 is §Wwhite§b. Literacy, country size, and national ideas now also factor into leadership point generation.
I would like to know more.

Healthcare reform is the primary way of growing your population and stabilizing the in game economy. The reforms are time locked, require certain techs to pass, and they have to be funded via the social spending slider. You get no pop growth benefit just by passing the reform, in order to receive the benefits of the reform you must have your social spending slider set to the minimum amount listed in the reform. The money spent on healthcare counts as income for POPs and is taxed just like any other income.
I would like to know more.

Daily research points from average literacy was reduced and a new category of reforms called Research & Development was added that gives +0.2 RPs and -1% tax efficiency per level. There are 10 levels of R&D reforms and each level requires an additional 10% average literacy to pass. R&D reforms can be raised or lowered instantly and without cost via decision. At the beginning of every year, POPs with over 10% literacy will lose literacy  at a rate of 0.1% for every 10 literacy, so a POP with 50% literacy will lose 0.5% and a POP with 100% literacy will lose 1%. The max base cap for clergymen is 2% and is increased by 0.5% per school reform level, up to a max of 4%.
I would like to know more.

The first thing you should do is max out national admin efficiency by promoting bureaucrats in your largest accepted culture POP states. Tariff efficiency, building costs, POP promotion, and half the crime fighting rate are based off your national admin efficiency. National admin efficiency does not take into account where the bureaucrats are located, so you can increase bureaucrats in your biggest state with accepted culture POPs above 1% in order to max out national admin efficiency. State admin efficiency is different from national admin efficiency and does not have any affect on POP promotion rates, tariffs, or taxes. The only thing state admin efficiency affects is crime fighting efficiency.
I would like to know more.

Welcome to the Great War bookmark of Victoria Universalis. Due to the inability to have the AI join wars that are already underway or merge wars via event, this scenario starts with all European participants already at war from the start and the Greek National Schism already underway. If a participant in the Great War other than the UK or Germany sues for a separate peace, that counts as a loss for said country and their surrender event will trigger. Surrender events are scripted and will result in the same exchange of territories each time. If a country other than Russia separately surrenders and their side still goes on to win the Great War, they will recoup some of the territory they lost when they separately surrendered.
We are introducing new agricultural techniques and modern medicine to these barren wastelands. The local population growth is expected to rise to civilized standards.
The geneva convention military hospital and infamy modifiers will be added to your country now

The Hungarian Diet has grown increasingly independent of Austrian rule in recent years. Field Marshall Count Franz Philipp von Lamberg was sent to Hungary to take personal control over their armies, but was attacked upon his arrival. In response, the Austrian government ordered the Hungarian Diet dissolved and the Ban of Croatia installed in Lamberg's place. The Hungarians have refused to obey, and thus we now face civil war to maintain the integrity of the empire.

After the latest war our subjects in Poland and other parts of our empire began to grow restless. The uprising began as a spontaneous protest by young Poles against conscription into the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Army. It was soon joined by high-ranking Polish-Lithuanian officers and various politicians. In Warsaw alone 116 demonstrations were held in $YEAR$. Much of these manifestations in ended in clashes with the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Army. In spite of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ police interference, a symbolic meeting of hymn-singing Poles and Lithuanians took place on the bridge across an important River. The crowds sang "God protect Poland" in Lithuanian and Belarusian. Earlier in $YEAR$ the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government introduced a state of emergency in Kovno and Grodno as well as several other Polish-majority provinces. Public gatherings were banned and some public leaders were declared outlaws. The situation threatens to break down in anarchy.
The German population explosion has ended.

Worried by the growth of the socialist movement, Bismarck instituted the Anti-Socialist Laws in 1878. Socialist organizations and meetings were forbidden - except the SPD, which was allowed to take part in the elections - as was the circulation of socialist literature. Despite these efforts, the socialist movement steadily gained supporters and seats in the Reichstag. Bismarck's strategy in the 1880s was to win the workers over for the conservative regime by implementing social benefits. He added accident and old-age insurance as well as a form of socialized medicine.
We will fight socialism with socialism.
There is much anger and resentment over the loss of Alsace Lorraine. Men are enlisting in droves for the chance to seek vengeance on our foes.
We will reclaim our rightful lands!

Greivances against Napoleon III over his mishandling of the recent war and suppression of his political opponents has reached a boiling point. The National Assembly has voted to overthrow Napoleon and establish a constitutional republic to govern France.

As Louis Napoleon grasped dictatorial power and introduced a harsh constitution he took the next step and held a referendum for the reintroduction of the Empire. Nearly 8 million Frenchmen voted yes and he became French Emperor under the name Napoleon III.

Resistance against the $CAPITAL$ government has culminated in a breakdown in authority. What began with several of the outlying warlords declaring their independence has ended with the most powerful generals in the Beiyang Army struggling for control. A contest has begun regarding who will control the future of China's destiny, and most are certain it will not be long before the entire nation is engulfed in war.
Now that we control Nanjing, we can declare ourselves to be the true Nationalist Chinese regime and inherit all of their claims.
Now that we control Beijing, we can declare ourselves to be the true Chinese regime and inherit all of their claims.
It would be best suited for us to move the capital and new central government to Nanjing.
Nanjing will make a fine base of power.
With most of China under our control, the other warlords have no choice but to recognize our might and submit to our authority.
With most of China under the control of one warlord, we have been asked to consider joining the new central government.
We do not recognize the usurper!
Now that $COUNTRY$ is a colonial power, it is time to decide a policy of how $COUNTRY_ADJ$ colonial lands will be administered.
Our people need more land to settle!
We shall rule our colonies through local rulers.
It is our burden to bring civilization to these lands.
Now that $COUNTRY$ is no longer a colonial power, it is time to reform the bureaucracy centered on the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ homeland.
Who needs a place in the sun anyways?
For too long our people have suffered Ottoman oppression. Let us finish what we started in the Serbian revolution and rid our lands of the Turk once and for all.
We have defeated the vile Ottoman scum and reclaimed our ancestral lands. Serbia will be great once more!
For too long our people have suffered Ottoman oppression. Let us finish what we started in the Greek revolution and rid our lands of the Turk once and for all.
We have defeated the vile Ottoman scum and reclaimed our ancestral lands. Greece will be great once more!
The Greek diaspora is returning to our lands in droves and the Turks are leaving either voluntarily or by force.
For too long our people have remained divided and under foreign rule. It is time we proclaimed a united kingdom of Romania!
You will receive your annual Admin Points allocation when this counter runs out.
Liberal agitators are spreading their ideology among the people
Socialist agitators are spreading their ideology among the people
Communist agitators are spreading their ideology among the people
Fascist agitators are spreading their ideology among the people

You do not need upper house support to pass reforms as long as this modifier persists. Other requirements must still be met, e.g. you need to have medicine in order to pass trinket healthcare and it cannot be less than 6 months since you last passed a reform.

Our government has forced through a reform without the support of the upper house. We will have to wait some time before we can force through another reform. Furthermore, the people will become more militant for some time due to the authoritative actions of the state.
We are justifying our aggression to the international court
Prevents Pandemic Influenza from recurring in your country as long as modifier is active.
Enlistment campaigns are being held all over the country to attract more men into the army.
We have already recruited the best mind our war academies had to offer. We must wait for the next graduating class to complete their training before we can recruit another great commander.
This province is currently under martial law.
The country is currently under martial law. This negatively impacts POP promotion rate.
All resources in the country are being directed to war. The people make do with what little scraps they have in order to feed the army.
Ethnic nationalism and political instability within Ottoman held territories are at an all time high. The slavs in the Balkans dream of freedom and they look to us for salvation.
It is time to grant equal rights to the Sudanese
It is time to grant equal rights to the Bedouins
It is time to grant equal rights to the Mashriqi
It is time to grant equal rights to the Misri
It is time to grant equal rights to the Kurds
It is time to grant equal rights to the Armenians
It is time to grant equal rights to the Albanians
It is time to grant equal rights to the Bosniaks
It is time to grant equal rights to Czechs
It is time to grant equal rights to Poles
It is time to grant equal rights to Slovenes
It is time to grant equal rights to Croats

The Common Army was the name of the non-German military branch of the Austrian empire. As more cultures get accepted, the Common Army shrinks in order to represent the establishment of each ethnicity's independent army.

The Common Army was the name of the non-German military branch of the Austrian empire. As more cultures get accepted, the Common Army shrinks in order to represent the establishment of each ethnicity's independent army.

The Common Army was the name of the non-German military branch of the Austrian empire. As more cultures get accepted, the Common Army shrinks in order to represent the establishment of each ethnicity's independent army.

The Common Army was the name of the non-German military branch of the Austrian empire. As more cultures get equal status in the empire, the Common Army shrinks in order to represent the establishment of each ethnicity's independent army.
Christians must pay a jizya tax and are subject to conscription into Ottoman armies.

Despite the dissolution of the Janissaries during the Ausipcious Incident in 1826, the continued persecution and enslavement of christians continues. This discrimination must be stamped out in order to create a unified Ottoman state.
The Egyptian rebels have been crushed and are ready to submit to Ottoman rule once more.
Muhammad Ali has declared independence from the Sublime Porte and is threatening our holdings in Syria. We must act now if we are to re-establish Ottoman authority in Egypt and the Levant.

One of the early goals of the liberal movement in the 19th century Ottoman Empire was the creation of a new pan Ottoman identity that all cultures and religions could identify with. This decision sets a country flag that grants increased assimilation chance. Assimilation chance is different and more important than assimilation rate.

In an effort to reduce ethnic and sectarian strife, all minorities have been decreed Ottoman citizens with equal rights. As long as militancy is kept low, the people should readily adopt their new national identity.
By establishing a dominant position on the Italian peninsula, we can secure a national homeland for our people by proclaiming ourselves the motive power of a unified Italian state.
By establishing a dominant position on the Italian peninsula, we can secure a national homeland for our people by proclaiming ourselves the motive power of a unified Italian state.
We have driven the Austrians out of Lombardia and are now the preeminent power in northern Italy. The rest of the north Italian kingdoms have agreed to unite under our leadership.
It is time to grant equal rights to the southern Italians.
The Iberian kingdoms have agreed to unite under our rule.
Enacting this decision will turn off the Unite Iberia decision and enable the Embrace Filipino minority decision.
It is time to grant equal rights to the Filipinos.
The new equal status conferred to one of our minorities allows them to establish their own national army independent of the Common Army.

One of the main tenants of the newly formed German Confederation is to confer privileged status to ethnic Germans. We will have to abandon our hopes of creating a Danubian Confederation in order to appease our German brothers.

Mother, mother! Old man Johnson has bought a new machine! It can plough, pull, tear, move, and you can ride on it! He says it's called a 'tractor'!'\n\nThe advent of the tractor in $COUNTRY$ has led to a revolution in local agriculture, with farm output increasing on a scale unfathomable a mere generation ago. Truly, the boons of industry are good unto $COUNTRY$.
column3: Maman, maman ! Le vieux Johnson a achet?une nouvelle machine ! Il peut labourer, tirer, arracher, d?lacer, et vous pouvez m?e monter sur elle ! Il dit que l'on appelle ? un ?racteur?! \n\nL'av?ement du tracteur ?$COUNTRY$ conduit une r?olution dans l'agriculture locale, avec la production agricole qui augmentera ?une ?helle insondable et cela en ?peine une g??ation. En v?it? les faveurs de l'industrie sont bien bonnes envers $COUNTRY$.

Er sagt, die Maschine sei ein 'Traktor'!'\n\nDie Einf?rung von Traktoren in $COUNTRY$ hat zu einer Revolution der lokalen Landwirtschaft gef?rt und die landwirtschaftliche Leistung auf ein Niveau gehievt, von dem man vor nur einer Generation nur tr?men konnte. Wahrlich, die G?ter der Industrie sind $COUNTRY$ gn?ig.

Ciertamente, los beneficios de la industria son un bien para $COUNTRY$.

column2: Mother, Mother! Have you seen the lights on Main Street? They're putting new lights in the lamp posts! They say that they're powered by 'electricity'!'\n\nElectricity, in the form of street lights, have arrived in $COUNTRY$. This new type of lighting illuminates our cities in ways that have hereto only been dreamt of, increasing the efficiency and productivity of local industry, as well as the local quality of life.

Ils disent qu'ils sont aliment? par une chose appel? ?lectricit? ! \n\nL'?ectricit? sous la forme d'?lairage des rues, est arriv? en $COUNTRY$. Ce nouveau type d'?lairage illumine nos villes de fa?n ?pr?entement r?er d'accro?re l'efficacit?et la productivit?des industries locales, ainsi que la qualit?de vie.

Man sagt, diese w?den von 'Elektrizit?' betrieben!'\n\nDie Elektrizit? hat in Form von Stra?nbeleuchtungen in $COUNTRY$ Einzug gehalten. Diese neue Beleuchtungsart erleuchtet unsere St?te auf eine Art und Weise, von der wir vorher nur tr?men konnten. Dies erh?t die Effizienz und die Produktivit? der lokalen Industrie und die Lebensqualit? der lokalen Bev?kerung.
column6: ?am? mam? ?as visto las luces en la calle mayor? ?st? poniendo luces nuevas en las farolas! .icen que funcionan con 'electricidad'!\n\nLa electricidad , en forma de luz en las calles, ha llegado a $COUNTRY$. Este nuevo tipo de luz ilumina nuestras ciudades de una forma hasta ahora solo so?da, lo que incrementa el rendimiento y la productividad de la industria local, as?como la calidad de vida local.

column2: Mother, Mother! Have you heard the sounds and booms echoing from the mine? They say it's a new type of explosive!'\n\nThe introduction of nitroglycerin, and with it the ability to dig deeper into the mine shafts than ever before, in $COUNTRY$ means that the local mining industry has increased its output several times over.
column3: Maman, maman ! Avez-vous entendu les sons et les booms en ?ho de la mine ? Ils disent que c'est un nouveau type d'explosif ! \n\nL'introduction de la nitroglyc?ine, et avec elle la capacit?de creuser plus profond?ent dans les puits de mine, ?$COUNTRY$, signifie que l'industrie mini?e locale va augmenter de plusieurs fois sa production.
column4: Mutter, oh Mutter! Hast du das Donnern und Wummern aus der Mine geh?t? Sie sagen, das sei eine neue Sprengstoffart!'\n\nDie Einf?rung von Nitroglyzerin und die damit einhergehende M?lichkeit, Minensch?hte tiefer als je zuvor in den Boden zu treiben, hat der lokalen Bergbauindustrie in $COUNTRY$ erm?licht, ihre Leistung um ein Vielfaches zu steigern.
column6: ?am? mam? ?as o?o los sonidos de las explosiones que llegan de la mina? .icen que es un nuevo tipo de explosivo!\n\nLa introducci? de la nitroglicerina, y con ella la capacidad para excavar a m? profundidad que nunca en los pozos mineros, en $COUNTRY$ significa que la industria minera local ha incrementado su producci? en varios enteros.

column2: Mother! Mother! They've opened a new store in town!'\n\nThe nineteenth century saw the development of vastly improved channels for the distribution of goods to broader groups of customers. The opening of new, specialized and industrialized retailers was essential in bringing new industrial goods, produced in factories, to consumers. The new store in $COUNTRY$ will increase the efficiency of the local farms, as farmers have to spend less time in travel to and from markets.
column3: M?e ! M?e ! Ils ont ouvert un nouveau magasin en ville ! \nLe XIXe si?le voit le d?eloppement de fili?es am?ior?s pour la distribution des biens ?des franges plus larges de la population. L'ouverture d'enseignes, sp?ialis?s et professionalis?s, pour l'apport de nouveaux produits fabriqu? dans des usines pour les consommateurs. Le nouveau magasin ?$COUNTRY$ augmentera l'efficacit?des exploitations agricoles, les agriculteurs vont passer moins de temps en d?lacement aux foires et autres march?.
column4: Mutter! Mutter! In der Stadt haben sie einen neuen Laden aufgemacht!'\n\nIm neunzehnten Jahrhundert wurden die Vertriebskan?e zur G?erverteilung an breitere Konsumentengruppen stark verbessert. Die Er?fnung neuer, spezialisierter und industrialisierter Einzelhandelsgesch?te war unerl?slich daf?, neue, in Fabriken hergestellte Industrieg?er zum Konsumenten zu bringen. Der neue Laden in $COUNTRY$ wird die Effizienz der lokalen Bauernh?e steigern, da die Bauern nun weniger Zeit f? Fahrten zu den M?kten aufwenden m?sen.
column6: ?am? ?am? ?an abierto un almac? en el pueblo!\nEl siglo diecinueve contempl?el desarrollo de canales ampliamente mejorados para la distribuci? de mercanc?s entre un n?ero mayor de clientes. La apertura de comercios nuevos, especializados e industrializados fue esencial para acercar a los consumidores los nuevos productos industriales producidos en las f?ricas. El nuevo almac? en $COUNTRY$ incrementar?el rendimiento de las granjas, mientras que los agricultores podr? ahorrar tiempo en tener que ir y venir a los mercados.

column2: Mother! Mother! Father says that they've got new tools in the mine!'\n\nWith the invention of machine tools, mines are slowly being fitted with new and efficient tools to aid the excavation of the slumbering riches below the surface. Mine efficiency and size has been increased in $COUNTRY$ on account of this.
column3: M?e ! M?e ! P?e dit qu'ils ont de nouveaux outils ?la mine ! \n\nAvec l'invention des machines-outils, les mines sont peu ?peu ?uip?s d'appareils nouveaux et efficaces pour aider ?l'excavation des richesses endormies sous la surface. L'efficacit?des mines et leur taille ont ??augment?s en $COUNTRY$, et cela est ?mettre sur le compte de ces nouveaux outils.
column4: Mutter! Mutter! Vater sagt, dass sie jetzt in der Mine neue Werkzeuge haben!'\n\nDurch die Erfindung von Maschinenwerkzeugen werden die Minen allm?lich mit neuen und effizienten Werkzeugen ausgestattet, die beim Abbau der Reicht?er unterhalb der Erdoberfl?he helfen. Aus diesem Grund hat sich die Bergbaueffizienz und der Bergbauumfang in $COUNTRY$ erh?t.
column6: ?am? ?am? ·ap?dice que tienen herramientas nuevas en la mina!\n\nCon la invenci? de maquinaria, las minas est? siendo dotadas, poco a poco, con herramientas nuevas y de buen rendimiento para ayudar en la excavaci? de las riquezas que yacen bajo la superficie. A causa de ello, el rendimiento y el volumen minero se ha incrementado en $COUNTRY$.

column2: Let us not dig too deep and greedily, though.
column3: Veillons cependant ?ne pas creuser trop profond et ?ne pas nous montrer trop gourmands.
column4: Lasst uns trotzdem nicht zu tief und gierig graben!
column6: En cualquier caso, que no nos ciegue la avaricia y excavemos m? de la cuenta

column2: Mother! Mother! Father says that they've got fertilizer for the field!'\n\nWith the invention of the Haber-Bosch Process, farmlands are slowly being fixed with vast amounts of fertilizer. Farm efficiency has been vastly increased in $COUNTRY$ on account of this.

Communist or fascist government flag has been cleared.
This tech allows you to enact trinket healthcare.
This tech allows you to enact low healthcare.
This tech allows you to enact acceptable healthcare.
This tech allows you to enact good healthcare.
This tech upgrades your centralization level from regionalism to unitary. This event does not fire for countries that don't have regionalism.
This invention allows you to colonize and use the Acquire Sub-Saharan African State casus beli.
This invention increases your mobilization size by 2%.
This invention increases your mobilization size by 1%.

The current Argentinian constitution was drafted in 1853 and approved by all provincial governments despite a short lived revolt from Buenos Aires.  It was closely inspired by the juridical and political doctrines of the United States Federal Constitution, establishing for instance a Republican division of powers, a high level of independence for the provinces, and a federal power controlled by a strong executive government yet limited by a bicameral national congress.
A house divided against itself cannot stand. We will deal with the issue of slavery even if it means war.
This decision will trigger the Sepoy Rebellion event and cause an independence war to occur between all existing Indian puppets and Britain.
We must break British tyranny in India!

Lei Aurea, or the Golden Law, abolished slavery once and for all throughout Brazil. The law contained only two artices: Slavery was to be abolished, and any previous ruling contradicting the first article was now void.

The use of opium has spread throughout the land. Farmers and laborers fail to turn up for work, and entire fields fall fallow, as the people slip further and further down into the mists of consuming dependence.
The consumption of opium has been outlawed. Only time will tell if this ban is successful.
Now that we are in control of most of the world's supply of opium we can monopolize the drug trade in China.
They will not complain if they know what's good for them.
The opium trade with China has become untenable for us and our merchants have already begun to pull out of Chinese markets.
The chinese government has burned our recent shipments of opium and expelled our merchants from their shores. Our economy will suffer a serious blow if the ban stays in place. What shall we do?
Force them to lift the ban and make them pay for the shipments they have destroyed.

The christian mystic Hong Xiuquan has declared a new kingdom of heaven in Nanjing. He claims he is the brother of Jesus Christ, sent to China to free it from it's demonic Manchu overlords. Millions of people in the surrounding provinces have joined his God Worshipping Society and are on the verge of open rebellion.
Play as the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.
The war to decide the fate of China has begun.
The war to decide the fate of China has begun.
Our armies are in disarray and cannot fight effectively

The imperial examinations are a civil service examination system for selecting candidates for the state bureacracy. It focuses mainly on classic literature and Confucianist philosophy while omitting or downplaying western science, mathematics, and military affairs. Rigid adherence to the imperial exams is stifling the adoption of western technology and it must be abolished if China is to modernize in a timely fashion.

The imperial examinations were a civil service examination system in Imperial China for selecting candidates for the state bureaucracy. By the time of the late Qing dynasty, its Confucianist principles were directly at odds with modern western thought.

Reformers in our court warn us of the growing power of the West and they say that we must embark upon a path of modernization in order to not fall behind. However, the conservative hardliners will oppose any attempt at supplanting our traditional Confucianist systems with barbaric European science.
The numerous defeats we have suffered to rebellions and foreigners have convinced both the court and population of the need for reform.

The New Policies were a series of cultural, economic, educational, military, and political reforms that were implemented in the last decade of the Qing dynasty to keep the dynasty in power after a series humiliating defeats by foreign powers.

The New Policies were a series of cultural, economic, educational, military, and political reforms that were implemented in the last decade of the Qing dynasty to keep the dynasty in power after a series humiliating defeats by foreign powers.
Our people are hopelessly addicted to the "black spice". It has dulled their minds, destroyed their productivity, and left them destitute.

We have been humiliated and forced to sign an unequal treaty that allows an unrestricted flow of opium into our country from the west. It will take some time before we can build up enough strength to challenge the westerners again.
Our monopoly on the opium trade with China is a great boon to our economy.
Our army is made up of mostly conscripted peasants and their fighting capability suffers as a result

It is time we banned the use of this poison and expel the foreign barbarians that forced this drug upon us. Beware that enacting this decision will give other countries the Opium War casus belli against us.

This will trigger the Taiping Rebellion event and remove the Chinese Isolationism modifier. All armies will be reduced to 0 organisation for 45 days to allow time for the Taiping rebels to mobilize. The Taiping Rebellion will trigger in 1860 if this decision is not enacted before then.

This decision will change the country into a democracy and add Han, Hakka, and Min as accepted cultures. Not passing this decision after civilizing while your militancy is greater than 2 or you are missing any cores will trigger the Warlord Era event which breaks the country up into several Warlord Cliques.
We have pushed the Egyptians out of the Levant and they are ready to sue for peace. Are we content with our holdings in the Levant or do we press on and occupy all of Egypt?
We will grant them their independence in exchange for Syria and Palestine.
We will take back all of Egypt!
We have been pushed out of the Levant and the Ottomans are offering peace if we give up our claims in Syria and Palestine. Do we accept or do we continue the fight?
The Egyptians have agreed to give up their claims to Syria and Palestine in exchange for their independence.
The Egyptians have refused to give up their claims to Syria and Palestine.
Now we will make them give up their claims to Egypt as well!
Recent unrest in the Balkans has given the the Tsar a casus beli to proclaim himself protector of all Slavs.
We will make him regret this!

We have pushed the Turks out of the Balkans and they are ready to negotiate. The other great powers want to limit our wargoals in the Balkans to only liberating part of the Balkans instead of all of it. We can agree to their demands and end the war now, or continue the war and enforce our original wargoal.
We will liberate all of the Balkans!

The war is turning against us and the Russians are offering to let us keep a small portion of the Balkans in the regions of Macedonia and Albania in exchange for peace. Do we accept or do we continue the fight?
We will not surrender one inch of the Balkans!
The Ottomans have agreed to free the majority of their lands in the Balkans as well as give the province of Kars to us.
The Ottomans have rejected our generous peace offer.
Now we will really make them pay!
The Congress of Berlin has gifted us with stewardship over the lands of Bosnia. Shall we incorporate it into our own territories or set it free?
We have to wait until the truce is over to justify another war in the middle east.
It is time to claim the Libyan Desert.
It is time to take control over Darfur.
It is time to take control over Equatoria.
It is time to take over Southern Ethiopia.
It is time to take control over Inner Liberia.
Our armies are currently being re-organized along modern European standards.
Hiring european military advisors is the quickest way to modernize our army.

In the 18th and 19th century Pest became the natural commercial, transportation, industrial and cultural centre of Hungary while nearby towns of Buda and Óbuda remained small. The Chain Bridge linking Buda with Pest was opened some time ago as the first permanent bridge across the Danube and everyday the town of Pest grows in importance, rivalling Vienna. But to have a modern metropolis, with enough space for a growing population and big enough to accommodate the ever growing Pest, it would be wise if we unified the three towns of Buda, Óbuda and Pest in one capital: Budapest.

The dreaded potato blight has arrived on the shores of Ireland. With crops failing and starvation spreading across the countryside, many are turning to the New World to escape their misfortunes. Worst yet, some are clamoring for landlord-tenant reforms and there is even talk of a growing Irish nationalist movement that seeks independence from Westminster.
We will deal with it as best we can.
Famine spreads as crops lie, dead and rotting, in our fields

The Corn Laws were tariffs and other trade restrictions on imported food and grain enforced in the United Kingdom. The laws raised food prices and the costs of living for the British public, and hampered the growth of other British economic sectors. Note that even though increased goods consumption and increased factory input have green text in the event modifier, they are bad.

The victorious Allies have enforced their demands on the vanquished nations of the Central Powers. Austria-Hungary is to be dismantled along ethnic lines, Bulgaria cedes its territories in Macedonia, and the Ottoman Empire is no more. Germany surrenders East Prussia to Russia, Alsace-Lorraine to France, and its colonial Empire to Britain.

The victorious Allies have enforced their demands on the vanquished nations of the Central Powers. Austria-Hungary is to be dismantled along ethnic lines, Bulgaria cedes its territories in Macedonia, and the Ottoman Empire is no more. Germany surrenders Alsace-Lorraine to France, its colonial Empire to Britain, and parts of its Eastern territories to the new Polish and Lithuanian states.

The victorious Central Powers have enforced their demands on the vanquished Allied nations. Bulgaria united the lands of Greater Bulgaria from its neighbors in the Balkans. Austria-Hungary has regained its lands in northern Italy and annexed Serbia and Montenegro. The Ottoman Empire reclaimed Kars and Cyprus. Germany annexed territories along the French and Belgian border and seized most of the colonies belonging to the Allies in the rest of the world.
The Pax Britannica ends and the Kaiserreich begins!

The victorious Central Powers have enforced their demands on the vanquished Allied nations. Bulgaria united the lands of Greater Bulgaria from its neighbors in the Balkans. The newly indepedent Austrian Republic was granted lands of the former Habsburg monarchy in northern Italy and Slovenia. The Kingdom of Hungary has regained the territories it lost from the dissolution of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. The Ottoman Empire reclaimed Kars and Cyprus. Germany annexed territories along the French and Belgian border and seized most of the colonies belonging to the Allies in the rest of the world.
The Pax Britannica ends and the Kaiserreich begins!
Our new land border to Luxembourg allows us to take direct control over its domestic and foreign affairs.
The newly formed German state is asking us to secede the German populated island of Heligoland to them.
We will give it to them in good faith.

Our loss in the sepoy rebellion has incited the rest of our subjects in India to declare their allegiance to the new Indian state. The British position in the subcontinent has become untenable and we have no choice but to withdraw completely.
The sun sets on the British Empire.
